description.title: Who am I ?
description.subtitle: A Web Developer | Located In Lima - Peru
description.text: I have 6 years of experience in software development and integration. As a Mechatronics Engineer and Industrial Programmer, I have worked on data integration projects and the design of control interfaces for industrial systems. Currently transitioning into frontend web development, I bring hands-on experience with React, API data integration, and implementing updates for web platforms. I have collaborated closely with UI/UX design teams, QA testing teams, and backend developers to deliver efficient, scalable, and user-friendly solutions.

skills.title: What I Offer
skills.subtitle: Web Development
skills.text: Build, Maintenance, Update and Best Practices.
